about_the_game:
Prepare to embark on an unforgettable journey through the post-apocalyptic world of UNFATED, the first MMO built on Unreal Engine 5, unlocking the full potential of advanced graphics and breathtaking visuals. Brace yourself for an immersive experience where survival and resistance intertwine in a struggle for humanity's future against an ancient menace that emerged from behind the ice wall.



Not from the depths of outer space, but from an uncharted region concealed behind the icy confines of Antarctica, they emerged—a hidden faction that once thrived as the first inhabitants of Earth. Unleashing a war of devastating proportions, they sought to reclaim dominance over a world they once ruled. This long-forgotten chapter in history led to an extermination, reshaping the planet's destiny.



Now, ten years after the catastrophic attack, humanity stands divided into two factions. One group roams the barren landscapes, scavenging for sustenance and vital resources, their struggle against hunger and deprivation never-ending. The other faction, valiantly resisting the ancient invaders, finds sanctuary in underground bunkers. Within these fortified havens, they muster aid, weapons, and supplies for those who prove their mettle in the battle against their former rulers. The ancient beings harbour no intent to obliterate all humans, selectively eliminating those who resist while sparing those who submit. As a result, the chances of surviving an alien bullet may be higher for the first group, but hunger remains their most formidable adversary. Meanwhile, the resistance wields abundant supplies and weaponry, fiercely protecting their resources.



UNFATED's expansive world hosts numerous alien outposts, remnants of an ancient civilization that once held dominion. These formidable bastions serve as staging grounds for their otherworldly forces. Hidden deep underground, sinister creatures, once concealed behind the veil of history, now emerge only under the cover of darkness. Dismantling these outposts and vanquishing the malevolent creatures earns the recognition of the resistance, granting access to a vast repository of potent weapons and supplies. The completion of quests reveals the hidden truths of the ancient beings' origins, piecing together the puzzle of their reign and igniting a spark of hope for survival.



As you traverse diverse and unforgiving terrains, you will encounter designated safe zones—refuges from the perils that lurk outside. Within these havens, you can construct homes to shelter your vehicles and equipment. A vital workbench awaits, where you customize and enhance your weapons, striving for perfection in combat. Vehicles, essential for traversing the vast open world, can be acquired from skilled mechanics for a fee. Yet, some of the most coveted items and vehicles in guerrilla camps require more than mere currency. Perilous journeys await, as you brave the hazards of the map to acquire these rare treasures.



Forge alliances and cultivate friendships with fellow survivors, for strength lies in unity. Collaborating with others can lighten the burdens and add an exciting dimension to your journey. UNFATED's open world is as diverse as it is dangerous, divided into five distinct terrains: Urban, Forest, Desert, Snowy, and Radioactive. Each terrain presents unique challenges and characteristics. For instance, venturing into the wintry landscape without adequate warm clothing can be fatal, while the radioactive wasteland requires a gas mask to survive its toxic embrace.

Features

  • Immerse yourself in an MMO set in a post-apocalyptic world ravaged by an ancient invasion from behind the ice wall.
  • Experience a compelling narrative of survival and resistance as you fight for humanity's future against the once-dominant beings.
  • Conquer alien outposts and vanquish formidable creatures lurking in underground dungeons to earn the respect of the resistance.
  • Form alliances and build friendships to enhance your survival chances and make your journey more thrilling.
  • Witness advanced graphics and breathtaking visuals, unlocking the full potential of Unreal Engine 5.
  • Battle Royale mode featuring up to 100 players on the server, making for intense, adrenaline-pumping showdowns.
  • Explore a vast map area spanning 225 square kilometers, with diverse and non-monotonous locations.
  • Choose from an extensive array of weapons and vehicles to suit your combat style.

Prepare for an epic struggle where every decision matters. Will you succumb to the legacy of the ancient rulers, or will you rise up to reclaim humanity's destiny? The fate of the world rests in your hands in UNFATED.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3 / AMD FX
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 1030/ RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

short_description: An immersive post-apocalyptic MMO. Survive, resist and conquer in a world ravaged by ancient invaders. Form alliances, traverse diverse terrains, and reclaim humanity's destiny with Unreal Engine 5's breathtaking graphics and Chat GPT 4 natural language.
